title: crash
body: my league o legends crashed after i installez windows 10 tecnical preview, i can log in and press play.. but when we all connect and i try to buy starter items my game crash.. every time i try .. i dont have a screenshot and i have some friends who have this problem

replies.body:
Actually seems that everyone that has windows has problems.

Anyway windows 10 is still in beta preview, so you are using it on your own risk...
Same issue here, I know its technical preview, but lol is the only game that I have having this issue with windows 10, so anything changed in lol. Waiting for some feedback rito.
Same problem. i send a ticket to support. try to reinstall the game. and system recovery but still crash.
